official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands in Garfield County, Colorado, to Ralph D. and Connie V. Hubbell, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to two named individuals, without consideration, all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to certain real property.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands in Garfield County, Colorado, to Ralph D. and Connie V. Hubbell, and for other purposes.
